languages.text: Allies standing in the pool of blood deal 2+AB% more damage to enemies also standing in pools of blood.

languages.text: The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s allies deal +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies if both the ally and their target stand on the blood-covered cells.
languages.original_text: Allies standing in the pool of blood deal 2+AB% more damage to enemies also standing in pools of blood.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Allies standing in the pool of blood deal 2+AB% more damage to enemies also standing in pools of blood.
The Death Cult assassin's allies deal +<u>(2 + Agility bonus)</u>% more damage to enemies, if both the ally and their target stand on the cells covered in blood.

languages.text: Союзники {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасина культа смерти{/g} наносят на <u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} противникам, если этот союзник и его цель находятся на залитых кровью клетках.

languages.text: Los aliados del {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} infligen un +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a los enemigos si tanto el aliado como su objetivo están en las casillas cubiertas de sangre.

languages.text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}の味方は、その味方と標的の両方が血で覆われた細胞の上に立っている場合、敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。
languages.original_text: The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s allies deal +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies if both the ally and their target stand on the blood-covered cells.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}の味方は、その味方と標的の両方が血で覆われた細胞の上に立っている場合、敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。

languages.text: 如果{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}的敌人与盟友都站在被鲜血覆盖的地块上，则盟友攻击敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高<u>（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。

traits.locale_text: 如果{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}的敌人与盟友都站在被鲜血覆盖的地块上，则盟友攻击敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高<u>（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。

languages.text: Verbündete des {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassinen{/g} fügen Gegnern +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, wenn der Verbündete und sein Ziel auf den blutbedeckten Zellen stehen.

languages.text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçının{/g} dost birimleri, hem dost birim hem de hedefi kanla kaplı hücrelerde duruyorlarsa düşmana %<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirler.
